original_text: Now I am speaking to you who are Gentiles. God has sent me to be his apostle to the Gentiles. I thank him that he has given this important work to me. Now I am speaking to you who are Gentiles. God has sent me to be his apostle to the Gentiles. I thank him that he has given this important work to me.
korean_text: 내가 이방인인 너희에게 말하노라 내가 이방인의 사도인 만큼 내 직분을 영광스럽게 여기노니

sentences.original_text: Now I am speaking to you who are Gentiles.
sentences.korean_translation: 지금 나는 이방인인 당신에게 말하고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: to be his apostle to the Gentiles.
that he has given this important work to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서 나에게 이 중요한 일을 주셨기 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: Now I am speaking to you who are Gentiles.
sentences.korean_translation: 지금 나는 이방인인 당신에게 말하고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: to be his apostle to the Gentiles.
that he has given this important work to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서 나에게 이 중요한 일을 주셨기 때문입니다.
